3namespace Laravel\Lumen\Routing;
4
5use Closure as BaseClosure;
6use Illuminate\Contracts\Auth\Access\Gate;
7use Illuminate\Contracts\Bus\Dispatcher;
8use Illuminate\Http\JsonResponse;
9use Illuminate\Http\Request;
10use Illuminate\Support\Str;
11use Illuminate\Validation\ValidationException;
12use Illuminate\Validation\Validator;
13
14trait ProvidesConvenienceMethods
15{
16    /**
17     * The response builder callback.
18     *
19     * @var \Closure
20     */
21    protected static $responseBuilder;
22
23    /**
24     * The error formatter callback.
25     *
26     * @var \Closure
27     */
28    protected static $errorFormatter;
29
30    /**
31     * Set the response builder callback.
32     *
33     * @param  \Closure  $callback
34     * @return void
35     */
36    public static function buildResponseUsing(BaseClosure $callback)
37    {
38        static::$responseBuilder = $callback;
39    }
40
41    /**
42     * Set the error formatter callback.
43     *
44     * @param  \Closure  $callback
45     * @return void

47    public static function formatErrorsUsing(BaseClosure $callback)
48    {
49        static::$errorFormatter = $callback;
50    }
51
52    /**
53     * Validate the given request with the given rules.
54     *
55     * @param  \Illuminate\Http\Request  $request
56     * @param  array  $rules
57     * @param  array  $messages
58     * @param  array  $customAttributes
59     * @return array
60     *
61     * @throws ValidationException
62     */
63    public function validate(Request $request, array $rules, array $messages = [], array $customAttributes = [])
64    {
65        $validator = $this->getValidationFactory()->make($request->all(), $rules, $messages, $customAttributes);
66
67        if ($validator->fails()) {
68            $this->throwValidationException($request, $validator);
69        }
70
71        return $this->extractInputFromRules($request, $rules);
72    }
73
74    /**
75     * Get the request input based on the given validation rules.
76     *
77     * @param  \Illuminate\Http\Request  $request
78     * @param  array  $rules
79     * @return array
80     */
81    protected function extractInputFromRules(Request $request, array $rules)
82    {
83        return $request->only(collect($rules)->keys()->map(function ($rule) {
84            return Str::contains($rule, '.') ? explode('.', $rule)[0] : $rule;
85        })->unique()->toArray());
86    }
87
88    /**
89     * Throw the failed validation exception.
90     *
91     * @param  \Illuminate\Http\Request  $request
92     * @param  \Illuminate\Contracts\Validation\Validator  $validator
93     * @return void
94     *
95     * @throws ValidationException
96     */
97    protected function throwValidationException(Request $request, $validator)
98    {
99        throw new ValidationException($validator, $this->buildFailedValidationResponse(
100            $request, $this->formatValidationErrors($validator)
101        ));
102    }
103
104    /**
105     * {@inheritdoc}
106     */
107    protected function buildFailedValidationResponse(Request $request, array $errors)
108    {
109        if (isset(static::$responseBuilder)) {
110            return call_user_func(static::$responseBuilder, $request, $errors);
111        }
112
113        return new JsonResponse($errors, 422);
114    }
115
116    /**
117     * {@inheritdoc}
118     */
119    protected function formatValidationErrors(Validator $validator)
120    {
121        if (isset(static::$errorFormatter)) {
122            return call_user_func(static::$errorFormatter, $validator);
123        }
124
125        return $validator->errors()->getMessages();
126    }
127
128    /**
129     * Authorize a given action against a set of arguments.
130     *
131     * @param  mixed  $ability
132     * @param  mixed|array  $arguments
133     * @return \Illuminate\Auth\Access\Response
134     *
135     * @throws \Illuminate\Auth\Access\AuthorizationException
136     */
137    public function authorize($ability, $arguments = [])
138    {
139        [$ability, $arguments] = $this->parseAbilityAndArguments($ability, $arguments);
140
141        return app(Gate::class)->authorize($ability, $arguments);
142    }
143
144    /**
145     * Authorize a given action for a user.
146     *
147     * @param  \Illuminate\Contracts\Auth\Authenticatable|mixed  $user
148     * @param  mixed  $ability
149     * @param  mixed|array  $arguments
150     * @return \Illuminate\Auth\Access\Response
151     *
152     * @throws \Illuminate\Auth\Access\AuthorizationException
153     */
154    public function authorizeForUser($user, $ability, $arguments = [])
155    {
156        [$ability, $arguments] = $this->parseAbilityAndArguments($ability, $arguments);
157
158        return app(Gate::class)->forUser($user)->authorize($ability, $arguments);
159    }
160
161    /**
162     * Guesses the ability's name if it wasn't provided.
163     *
164     * @param  mixed  $ability
165     * @param  mixed|array  $arguments
166     * @return array
167     */
168    protected function parseAbilityAndArguments($ability, $arguments)
169    {
170        if (is_string($ability)) {
171            return [$ability, $arguments];
172        }
173
174        return [debug_backtrace(DEBUG_BACKTRACE_IGNORE_ARGS, 3)[2]['function'], $ability];
175    }
176
177    /**
178     * Dispatch a job to its appropriate handler.
179     *
180     * @param  mixed  $job
181     * @return mixed
182     */
183    public function dispatch($job)
184    {
185        return app(Dispatcher::class)->dispatch($job);
186    }
187
188    /**
189     * Dispatch a command to its appropriate handler in the current process.
190     *
191     * @param  mixed  $job
192     * @param  mixed  $handler
193     * @return mixed
194     */
195    public function dispatchNow($job, $handler = null)
196    {
197        return app(Dispatcher::class)->dispatchNow($job, $handler);
198    }
199
200    /**
201     * Get a validation factory instance.
202     *
203     * @return \Illuminate\Contracts\Validation\Factory
204     */
205    protected function getValidationFactory()
206    {
207        return app('validator');
208    }
